author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Suliman Khan, Suliman.khan18@mails.ucas.ac.cn, or Mengzhou Xue, xuemengzhou@zzu.edu.cn.

fn.p: Citation Khan S, Siddique R, Shereen MA, Ali A, Liu J, Bai Q, Bashir N, Xue M. 2020. Emergence of a novel coronavirus, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2: biology and therapeutic options. J Clin Microbiol 58:e00187-20. https://doi.org/10.1128/JCM.00187-20.
